messages.subject: Re: Skate Mom intro
messages.msgSnippet: You re awesome, Barb!! I m sending your NPR link on to my local groups.  If you find your way to the Dallas or N. TX area, give us a holler at
messages.messageBody:
You're awesome, Barb!!

I'm sending your NPR link on to my local groups. If you find your way
to the Dallas or N. TX area, give us a holler at
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/NorthTexasNaturalLearners/

We've got a gaggle of skaters (but no moms that I know of!) who would
love to meet you and skate with you.

I'll check out your book at a bookstore this weekend, too, if I can.

~ Aimee Tullos
NTNL Denton TX

messages.subject: RE: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Skate Mom intro
messages.msgSnippet: Hey Barb, I heard you on NPR today!  What a great story!  That s very cool that you are unschoolers.  I didn t notice that unschooling (or homeschooling) came
messages.messageBody:
Hey Barb,
I heard you on NPR today! What a great story! That's very cool that you
are unschoolers. I didn't notice that unschooling (or homeschooling) came
up in the interview unless I missed it. But that's way cool. I liked your
reaction after doing the half-pipe thing ( I know nothing about
skateboarding so I may have gotten that wrong).

Glad you made it here!
Kristin

-----Original Message-----
From: skaterbarb [SMTP:barb@...]
My name is Barb, aka Skateboard Mom. I'm unschooling with my 8 year old son
in Laguna
Beach, CA. It took me a bit to find this unschooling path, but we're
lapping it up now. We
tried school but it was actually a pack of teachers (!) who talked us into
homeschooling.

We're hoping to hook up with some of you--we travel quite a bit. I'm a
children's author
and will be taking my son on the road this year as I do the book tour, so
we're hoping to
meet other unschoolers en route. My son is into Legos, Legos, and did I
mention Legos?
He also reads like the dickens. I skateboard. He doesn't.

I'm supposed to be on NPR today. Here's the link if anyone's interested:
http://www.npr.org/templates/story/story.php?storyId=4283628

ciao for now,

skateboard mom

messages.subject: Skate Mom intro
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all, My name is Barb, aka Skateboard Mom. I m unschooling with my 8 year old son in Laguna Beach, CA.  It took me a bit to find this unschooling path, but
messages.messageBody:
Hi all,

My name is Barb, aka Skateboard Mom. I'm unschooling with my 8 year old son in Laguna
Beach, CA. It took me a bit to find this unschooling path, but we're lapping it up now. We
tried school but it was actually a pack of teachers (!) who talked us into
homeschooling.

We're hoping to hook up with some of you--we travel quite a bit. I'm a children's author
and will be taking my son on the road this year as I do the book tour, so we're hoping to
meet other unschoolers en route. My son is into Legos, Legos, and did I mention Legos?
He also reads like the dickens. I skateboard. He doesn't.

I'm supposed to be on NPR today. Here's the link if anyone's interested:
http://www.npr.org/templates/story/story.php?storyId=4283628

ciao for now,

skateboard mom
